summary: With this mod you can summon Gargoyles Mounts and Followers (Gargoyle + Dwarven Gargoyle + Flame Gargoyle + Perfect Blood Hybrid) wherever you want.The DLC Dawnguard is required.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000] [b] Gargoyles Mounts and Followers[/b][/color][color=#00ff00][b] version 1.5.[/b][/color] The DLC Dawnguard is required

[color=#00ff00][b] Optional File: Esp version Française [/b][/color]

"Gargoyles" allow you to summon 4 Gargoyles Mounts and (-simple-) Followers (Gargoyle + Dwarven Gargoyle + Flame Gargoyle + Perfect Blood Hybrid) wherever you want.

You can easily DISMISS when you want with a "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Gargoyle"

You can find the 4 Followers (with speech) in the Markath Stable (Gargoyle + Dwarven Gargoyle + Flame Gargoyle + Perfect Blood Hybrid)


To access in Vvardenfell (Morrowind) and Cyrodiil (Oblivion) with these mounts you have the 2 mods WIP: [url=http://morroblivion.com/]SKYWIND and SKYBLIVION [/url]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/SeXaQPa.gif[/img]


[color=#ff0000]INSTALLATION (very important)[/color]

[color=#ff8c00][i] Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

1) You have to put the folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "

[color=#ff8c00][i] For the manual and the NMM installations:[/i][/color]

2) You must place the new .esp at the bottom of the list in the "Data Files" when you launch the game to obtain the 5 books...(Normally, this is done automatically !)

3) (Only if you have download other mods "Summon...") You must INSTALL the summons (my other mods "summon") ONE BY ONE ! (ALL my mods are STANDALONE !)

You can find the “Spell tome: Summon XXXX " and the "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Gargoyle", at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun/Blancherive) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais Bleu in Solitude).

Duration of the summon: 1 hour (15' for the Flame Gargoyle)

4) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):

[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001


These settings allow you to see all mounts (of my mods) correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not

Gargoyles are in the [color=#ff0000] Video[/color] (French version of skyrim, but this mod version 1.1 is in ENGLISH) Merci à "tyrion45" pour cette video !

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]JXUiSCbvrGA[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

[color=#ff0000]Bugs or Problems [/color]

1) You can only have one Follower at a time: if you want a different one (in my other mods), you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If telling the follower to return at home (With message: “Your companion heads home”) doesn't dismiss him, or if you have "lost" the “active” Follower, you can try this:

Type “²” key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

2) With [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster [/url], or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) in the Data Files when you launch the game

3) If you have any problem with this mount, you can try a FAST TRAVEL...

[b]Video with my mods [/b]([color=#00ff00]Giants, Gargoyles, Werewolves, Trolls, Spiders[/color])

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]KHQarwkN7qE[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<

[color=#ff0000]Credits[/color]

Thanks to [color=#ff8c00]Vicn [/color] for the meshe of the Dwarven Gargoyle and the Flame Gargoyle in his mod [url=http://naaaaikikvicnvicn.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-139.html] Vicn Creature Resource [/url](”You can use any parts of this mod without my permission.”)

Thanks to [color=#ff8c00]Gendundrup [/color] in his mod[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49682/?] Nexus Creature Resource[/url] ("Skyrim Modders resources and tutorials") for the Perfect Blood Hybrid (The meshe and the textures are from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23911/?] Grohiik [/url])
